casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Elvin R. CABALLERO Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided May 30, 2017

Sean P. Barrett, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Timothy F. Costello, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, *726172 Conn. App. 556, 160 A.3d 1103 (2017), is denied.
